name: defat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove the fat (= a solid or liquid substance from animals or plants that is usually white or yellow) from something, especially food containing meat: Defat the cooking juices and pour them over the meat. De-fat the stock before you make the gravy.
More examplesFewer examplesOnce the stock has cooked, strain it, and defat it if necessary.After cooking the meat, I put the liquid in a separate pan and defat it the next day.We make our chicken soup, chill and defat the broth, and then freeze it.Use a ladle to defat the hot stock.De-fat the meat and marinate it overnight.
